In Baghdad Deputy Prime Minister Tariq Aziz repeated his government's stand -- it does not have any kind of weapons of mass destruction

Experts say Saddam Hussein's forces will likely try to hold out in Baghdad for as long as possible without using the weapons his government insists it does not have, hoping to build international pressure on the U.S. and Britain to back down
